Container.Name: arr-dashboard
Container.Overview: A unified dashboard for managing multiple Sonarr, Radarr, and Prowlarr instances. Features include unified queue/calendar/history views, global indexer search, library management, TRaSH Guides integration, automated hunting, statistics, and TMDB content discovery.
Container.Description: Arr Dashboard provides a unified interface to manage all your Sonarr, Radarr, and Prowlarr instances from one place. View queues, calendars, and history across all instances. Search content globally across all indexers. Manage your media library with tag-based organization. Automatically hunt for missing content and quality upgrades. Sync TRaSH Guides quality profiles and custom formats. Monitor health and statistics. Discover new content with TMDB integration. Supports OIDC (Authelia/Authentik) and passkey authentication. Built with modern architecture featuring zero-config Docker deployment, encrypted API keys, and secure session management.

Config.Name: DATABASE_URL
Config.Description: Optional: PostgreSQL connection string (e.g., postgresql://user:password@host:5432/database). Leave empty to use default SQLite database.

Config.Name: BACKUP_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Password for encrypted backups. Required for backup/restore functionality. Use a strong password (16+ characters) and store it securely.

Config.Name: SESSION_TTL_HOURS
Config.Description: How long sessions last before requiring re-login (in hours)

Config.Name: WEBAUTHN_RP_NAME
Config.Description: For passkey authentication: Display name shown to users during passkey registration.

Config.Name: WEBAUTHN_RP_ID
Config.Description: For passkey authentication: Your domain name without protocol (e.g., arr.example.com). Leave empty for localhost.

Config.Name: WEBAUTHN_ORIGIN
Config.Description: For passkey authentication: Full URL with protocol (e.g., https://arr.example.com). Leave empty for http://localhost:3000.

Config.Name: API_RATE_LIMIT_MAX
Config.Description: Maximum API requests per minute. Increase if you have many services or experience rate limiting.

Config.Name: GITHUB_TOKEN
Config.Description: Optional GitHub personal access token. Increases rate limits for TRaSH Guides updates from 60 to 5000 requests/hour.
